summary: In this clever homage to '80s slasher films, a group of teenagers looking to party get stranded when their ride breaks down and end up being stalked by a cannibalistic killer.
cast: Sarah Fisher|Mark Wiebe|Jesse Camacho|Kendra Leigh Timmins|David Lipper|Robert Patrick|Elise Gatien|Justin Kelly|Stephan James|Eve Harlow|Lanie McAuley|Alexander Calvert|Michael Vincent Dagostino|Rick Rosenthal
title: Lost After Dark
